website_summaries.verdict: A decent pick if you don't need a huge set. A good choice for anyone setting up a new kitchen or replacing old utensils.
pros: A good-looking set that includes the basics and offers durable silicone and stainless steel construction
Tops won't scratch pots and pans
cons: Whisk doesn't feel as sturdy as the other utensils
Water has a  tendency to collect in the handles, especially when washed in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Love these utensils
customer_reviews.text: Love these utensils! The ladle is my favorite so far, because I haven't been able to find one that won't rust and wasn't HUGE. I have not had an issue with the white dots that others wrote about or the tips falling off. They clean up nicely and honestly look great! The handles are metal so obviously they will get hot if you leave them in a hot pan. The whisk's handle is hollow, so when washing, dry with it upside down. The notch at the end is handy if you want to hang them up. I've been impressed with them so far. My mom really liked them so I'm thinking they'd make a nice mom's day gift!
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Teri F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a complete set of utensils that can keep up with my messy kitchen style. This pack has all I need in one set. Easy to clean durable and not heavy like some other one's. Very happy with it and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: vladimir yelisow

customer_reviews.title: Buy now
customer_reviews.text: These are nearly perfect! I wanted a complete set that was dishwashable and would not collect water/mold between the head and handle- these do not! I have been using for over a month and the silicon holds up great! Firm but flexible. My only complaint is that they are hard to clean by handwashing and usually require a second wash due to residue (looks like soap not food) after handwashing, but not after dishwashing.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this set because I purchased a different set and was disappointed that they were mostly made of plastic and they didn't last. This product is much better. The plastic is thick and the stainless steel is light weight but not to the point it feels cheap. They are also easy to clean. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: koskat2167

customer_reviews.title: Cheap... get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Great look and love the silicone ends but the hollow metal handles hold water from the dishwasher that will come out while in use. Kinda nasty. After a few months they started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: steven m howard

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite utensils
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a set of utensils that were separating from their handles for this set and I have been very pleasantly surprised. These look great, are very easy to clean, and have held up very well to high heat and almost daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wisk broke
customer_reviews.text: Contemplating whether to return. The majority of the utensils seem fine so far. The wisk was very flimsy and broke on first try. Metal to plastic connection wasnt strong enough for the stress that goes on that spot. Hoping no others break off. Might return, just hate to be bothered for 1 of the items. For the price, I was hoping for more than 90%
customer_reviews.author: DaveD

customer_reviews.title: Tong’s are not the best here
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like some of them to be honest. Like the tongs? It’s hard to pick up small pieces of meat. The spatculas? They seem like a good design, but I can’t even flip a pancake without it almost getting out of the pan. Don’t know if I’d recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Tongs are never easy to clean as well as pieces Glued together. If these were one solid piece they would be a bit easier to clean but the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Stick to all-rubber.
customer_reviews.text: The handles are hollow which would normally be fine but water leaked into some of mine, and they get rust spots super easily. The whisker is also very weak and susceptible to the rods getting out of shape so mixing becomes inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: P. Walter

customer_reviews.title: ... all in one pack and they all have a nice look. Satisfied with the product as expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need all in one pack and they all have a nice look. Satisfied with the product as expected. Quality is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work on Quality control!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this product. Both times, right after the return window closed, the whisk broke! The rest of the utensils are ok thus far, but am waiting for something else to break. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: micaelaSR

customer_reviews.title: Immediately broke during first use.
customer_reviews.text: The attached photo is what happened DURING the first use of the whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Adamsr0522

customer_reviews.title: Not knowing if I was going to like the new set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set with the idea of replacing some of the very old ones I had for quite sometime now. Not knowing if I was going to like the new set. To my pleasant surprise, not only did I like them...I LOVE THEM!!! The quality is excellent and I will stop buying from the dollar store in an attempt to save some money. I really, really like them. Since I bought them I haven't stopped using them. I even like the way they look. And since they are from the same package, I don't have the mismatch problem. I HIGHLY recommend them. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Gree

customer_reviews.title: Best Utensils Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best utensils I've every used! If I ever have to replace them, I will reorder this exact same set. I've had them for several months and they still look brand new. Super durable and very easy to clean. I've washed them both by hand and in the dishwasher and they show no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Proctor

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, won't scratch pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I have the most destructive family and these hold up like a boss. High quality and I love the ends won't scratch pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst cooking set I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I got this set, thought it was a decent quality and looked nice. Less than a week in, the caps on the end fell off. The inside holds water now and cannot be cleaned out because the cap is missing. Honestly, This was an amazon choice product and I am extremely blown away at the lack of quality in this set. It’s an embarrassment to the company who created these and amazon for calling this a great product
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE SARMENTO

customer_reviews.title: I think these are the most comfortable cooking utensels I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I think these are the most comfortable cooking utensels I've ever had. They are longer then ones I had in the past. They look really attractive in my utensel container.
customer_reviews.author: paula grede

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Term Product
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning was a little tough but easier to handwash than to use a dishwasher, had these for a little while now, and the whisk handle came off. I was not using a lot of force either and it popped off. I could superglue it back on but shouldn't have too, but they did last for a while and it's only one that's broken so far. With time quality diminishes on this product definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Caytrin Barrone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set, all pieces are durable. The first few times washing the black silicone, there is a white film left behind, but after washing three times before first use it is gone and does not come back. I think it is just a protective coating. Silicone does not separate from stainless handles,no water in handles. Very durable and classy look.
customer_reviews.author: K Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price and very good quality. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy, & reliable product by a great company
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product. The utensils are very sturdy, beautiful, easy to clean, and work very well with my nonstick surfaces. Using these utensils all my nonstick cookware still looks brand new, even after years of heavy use! After a long time of extremely heavy use by me and all of my roommates the utensils have finally begun to show some wear. I reached out to the seller "Mr&Mrs White", who responded to me instantly and is sending out a replacement set. All in all this is a very high quality product sold by a high quality company!
customer_reviews.author: Turner

customer_reviews.title: The only two functional items in this entire set are ...
customer_reviews.text: The only two functional items in this entire set are the tongs and whisk. Everything else is far too thick and the silicon compound that these are made of is really hard to clean for whatever reason.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of utensils. Well made, no loose parts. Easy to hold and use. Silicone parts attract dust but that’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable. Recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have stumbled upon this kitchen gem! These are better than I expected. Very sturdy for a non-stick safe utensil set. Others I've had get all flimsy the second they hit boiling water, these will not get flimsy in hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tools Ever
customer_reviews.text: Silicone is great. I like that the handles are stainless steel. I had other silicone tools that these replaced. The problem with the all silicone tools, including the handles is that the silicone would stick to each other. When i would try and remove one tool from the utensil holder on the counter it would stick to the other ones. With these have stainless steel handles they are easy to remove from the holder. Terrific quality and size. Best tools i have ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Arrived quickly, were exactly as described. The set comes with everything you would need for cooking. Love them! +++++
customer_reviews.author: Sergei

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy these after reading the reviews. I've had these for a few weeks and I was using the whisk, for maybe the 3rd time, and the handle just broke right off.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Best Utensils EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are just the right size, just the right weight, durable, strong, and every other word of praise that I can't think of right now. They are GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good set of utensils but I'm already seeing peeling happening on the turners. Shouldn't be doing this after a few months. I won't buy again. ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love them, great durability for the money. No cons just great products. U won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Seneca R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate and click Buy Now. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding product and quality. Very well built and nice looking utensils. Only thing that would make them better is if they offered a container option. I bought a new set of non-stick pans and want to keep them in peak condition. These tools will do just that. Don't hesitate. These are well worth the money and I'm genuinely shocked the price tag isn't double. They are really that good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year but just started using them in the past couple of months. They are a good product but I noticed a couple of them after several use started breaking at the steel part. I dont know how it happened. Otherwise they would actually be an awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: Analeslie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice set at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to stock our RV. The price was good and so far they seem pretty sturdy and well made. I will update after a few uses if I have any problems with any of them falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Values Out There
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve made! Very solidly built. Good length. Really easy to clean. These are exactly what I was looking and hoping for. Great value for the money as well. Highly recommend if you are looking for a utensil set.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This set is great value for money. The utensils appear to be well made and the handles are easy to grip. They seem to clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hirt

customer_reviews.title: Get what ya pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Lost the wisk during first use, cheaply made but work.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the usual plastic sets!
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful and are a nice weight. Haven’t used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Sultar

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen utensils
customer_reviews.text: I love these utensils. I’d honestly would buy again!not came with just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: Taea Jhingoree

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The only thing I don't like is how easily the cap at the end of the handles come off. Also, the handles get water in them when washed. I have to take the cap off and drain the water each time I take any of these out of the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: guyinoc

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this utensil set. They seem to be really good quality and should last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I really like these utensils, especially the extra large spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and completely none stick.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use the set is showing very little signs of use. They work as described and hold up well to daily use. I like that the spatulas are fairly stiff and have a perfect edge for getting under some difficult foods.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal C.

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Easy to clean, nice rigidity on the spatulas. Doesn’t feel cheap in your hand. Would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Look really nice, durable. Don’t melt into pan like plastic utensils. Dishwasher safe.

customer_reviews.title: Help with your cooking stuffs
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, you can manage all very well. No mess.

customer_reviews.title: No scratches on pans!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cooking ware I ever bought! They look super classy and professional and don’t scratch the surfaces of my pots and pans. I love them!

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! They are a great size, not too heavy, easy to use. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Leslie Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable kitchen utensil set
customer_reviews.text: These utensils are great. They're sturdy but don't scratch non stick pans and durable enough to resist melting from the heat. Also the vendor has been great in quickly replacing a couple of my spatulas that had the end cap fall out and get lost. All around I'm very impressed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Horst

customer_reviews.title: Good set to have
customer_reviews.text: The set is wonderful, except the whisk fell apart during my first use drop I had to throw it away. Other than that, I love the set. Very sturdy and feels great in my hand. The silicone tops do come out of my dishwasher with spots, but they perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sidle

customer_reviews.title: Quality utensils
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality, solid construction and won't scratch non-stick pans. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Barron Henley

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my Rachel Ray cookwear and they are wonderful. Easy to clean, very sturdy and they look very nice. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All but the Whisk
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set, with the exception of the whisk. i used the whisk two times and it fell into two pieces. Aside from that, all other utensils are phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! When I first received the set, the handle for the whisk came off after the first use. I let Julie know when she sent a follow up email asking how I liked the product and she sent me a new one the same day. I've had no other issues with the set and use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Walker

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Very well made and Easiest cleanup of any set I’ve had! Extremely happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: All products are strong and durable. My only complaint is that the whisk is pretty flimsy, but for the price you cant beat it!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about this purchase, but far exceeded my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the silicone design and very easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: Conditions after use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set 1 years ago, and now it’s on this condition. I really like this set, but I can’t use this manor spoon...

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the product. First time using the wisk to mix my pancake mix the handle fell off. so not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen set!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quick. Exactly what was ordered. I would order again for my mom. Satisfied with the product as expected. Quality is as advertised. I like it)
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and very pleased with quality. Sturdy. Only thing I would like to see is that you add a container for them. Didn’t realize they said Mr. & Mrs White on there initially. When I noticed that, I thought they belonged to someone else I know( no this is the maker.😃)
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, except the whisk
customer_reviews.text: Set arrived today and looks sturdy. My only complaint is the whisk - it's the only item in the entire set that is not silicone! Unfortunate that I'll have to buy a whisk that doesn't match the set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McKay

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! So sturdy and well made! Not light and cheap looking. I feel like a real chef with these bad boys!

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use with our ceramic cookware. Very sturdy and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: sandradia

customer_reviews.title: They look great in person and just a pleasure to cook
customer_reviews.text: They look great in person and just a pleasure to cook. I immediately discarded my old utensils regretting not doing it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lola

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but Broke easily
customer_reviews.text: They were nice and seemed durable. But with one use the whisk handle broke right off. Had to return soon after buying.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Winberg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the whisk it broke 🤦🏼‍♀️ They also won’t stop changing color once they have been dried, regardless of how they’re washed. Not impressed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Water seeps into the handle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this less than a year and there is water in the handle (because it is hallow) but the water cannot come out. I’m going to have to throw them out due to mold.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace an old set that was falling apart and they are great. Super light but not “chinsy” and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The whisk is junk, but the rest of the utensils are good.
customer_reviews.text: So far my only complaint is that the whisk broke the first time I used it beyond repair. I would have rated lower if the rest of the items were not performing as well as they are. But the whisk is junk.
customer_reviews.author: JBrewer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They look nice and are sturdy and they are easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than it looks
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I thought that it was dollar store stuff. It was so pleasant to discover that I was wrong! It’s heavier and doesn’t flex, nor does it scratch the nonstick surfaces of pans. It works well on stainless stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: D T

customer_reviews.title: 😁👍
customer_reviews.text: These utensils are awesome! I will be purchasing more for my sister and aunt to enjoy as well.

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very useful in the kitchen. Looks fancy without the high dollar cost.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this set for everyone!!!

customer_reviews.text: All the handles have a part that has a hole for hanging them up but that comes right off. Others than that they do what they should.

customer_reviews.title: Good, except for the whisk.
customer_reviews.text: 9 of the pieces are great, however the whisk fell apart the very first time I used it. Rest is great, whisk is bad.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than plastic
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this set. We got rid of all plastic for cooking, and were a little concerned with how well these would work. The spatulas are nice and large and easy to use and turn with. All the pieces are larger than what we previously had, and they are all sturdy. We were a little concerned about the tongs; the metal seemed a little weaker than the tongs we had been using, but my husband used them for chicken on the grill and said there were no issues. Have not had them long enough to speak to longevity, but so far we are really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: roadtripgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice utensils for my kitchen. Looks durable and so far no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I was told they were very happy with it . . .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Thank you.

product_meta.title: Cooking Silicone Utensils Set 10 — Best Nonstick Kitchen Cookware Utensil Sets — Large Hanging Spoons Spatula Set – Non Toxic Cook Gadget Kit Black
feature_bullets: ✅ COOKING UTENSIL SET 10 - 100% all you need for cooking in one kitchen utensil tool sets. This 10 pcs kitchen utensil set includes: large slotted spatula, skimmer, solid spatula, slotted spatula, solid spoon, slotted spoon, soup ladle, pasta server, tong, egg whisk.
✅ SILICONE UTENSILS - Dishwasher safe material we use for our cooking spatula utensils set and new utensil silicone formula protects your kitchen tools from white spots and any bad odors.
✅ NONSTICK KITCHEN UTENSILS - High quality silicone material was used to produce these cook utensils set. Silicone utensils are safe with cookware kit surfaces.
✅ STAINLESS STEEL UTENSIL SET - 100% best quality stainless steel material guarantees that cooking utensils handles won`t be break and melt like plastic ones or stick like wooden.
✅ 100% QUALITY WARRANTY! If you`re not satisfied with silicone cooking utensil set - don`t hesitate to contact us - we will do a replacement for you or will refund your money.
